title: Competency-Based Leadership Education Design for Medical Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Corporate leadership development program conducted on a flexible schedule using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for demonstrating conflict management and decision-making skills within a medical team.
Learners can record leadership behavior changes with over 80% participation through competency-based assessments and propose improvement plans.
Learners can develop a network-building plan for healthcare system improvement and propose at least two stakeholder collaboration strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
